segments.text: Were you born in the U . S . , Melissa ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I wasn't . I came here in 1992 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , did you go to college right away ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , because my English wasn't very good . I studied English for two years first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , your English is really fluent now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Your English is pretty good , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , but I was born here ! !
segments.speaker: S1
